scripts.build: bun run build:vendor && bun run build:css && bun run build:ts && bun run copy:fonts
scripts.build:vendor: bun build frontend/vendor.ts --outdir app/static/js --target browser --production --root frontend
scripts.build:css: bun build frontend/styles.css --outdir app/static/css --target browser --production --root frontend
scripts.build:ts: bun build frontend/*.ts --outdir app/static/js --target browser --production --root frontend
scripts.watch:ts: bun build frontend/*.ts --outdir app/static/js --target browser --watch --root frontend
